sen.j: 中村 橋之助（なかむら はしのすけ）は歌舞伎の名跡の一つ。
sen.e: Hashinosuke NAKAMURA is one of the professional names of Kabuki (traditional performing art).
Hashinosuke NAKAMURA is one of the professional names of Kabuki (traditional performing art) actors.

sen.j: - 後の中村四郎兵衛（元2代目加賀屋歌七）。
sen.e: He was later to become Shirobe NAKAMURA (the former second Utashichi KAGAYA)
sen.cmt: 「ハイフンを入れると計算式になるので、省力して翻訳しています」
